title: Hot Spring Kingpin
description:
I’m a king of the underworld. A criminal titan.

She’s an ice cream seller with freckles.

It’s stressful running an organization like mine. There are constant threats; huge riches; sudden violence. And I deal with it all, their king and commander—until my doctor tells me to relax. Or else.A vacation. A vacation. I can’t think of anything worse.But I go, and thank god that I do. Because at the hot springs, I see her.A young woman carrying an ice cream tray. An angel.In life, I take what I want.And I want her badly. She’s mine.
Hot Spring Kingpin is a short and steamy age gap instalove story, starring a grumpy kingpin who doesn’t know how to relax, and the ice cream seller who’s more than happy to teach him.
author: Cassie Mint
